name: CenterPoint Energy, Inc.
description: CenterPoint Energy, Inc. is a leading energy delivery company based in the United States, focusing primarily on electric and natural gas distribution. Established in 1882, the company has grown to serve millions of customers across several states, making it a significant player in the energy sector. CenterPoint operates through two main business segments: Electric Transmission & Distribution and Natural Gas Distribution. The Electric segment ensures reliable electricity delivery to customers, while the Natural Gas segment focuses on the safe and efficient distribution of natural gas. With a commitment to sustainability and innovation, CenterPoint is actively investing in smart grid technologies and renewable energy sources to enhance energy efficiency and reduce carbon emissions. The company is dedicated to improving the quality of life in the communities it serves by providing safe, reliable, and affordable energy solutions. CenterPoint's mission is to deliver energy with a focus on safety and customer service, while also contributing to a sustainable energy future. With ongoing efforts to modernize its infrastructure and increase energy efficiency, CenterPoint is poised to meet the evolving energy needs of its customers.
